main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported near Elizabeth City, North Carolina on December 6 and December 28, 1957.
interesting points: Witnesses observed a bright light estimated at 1000 feet altitude on December 6,The light was round and the size of a basketball,It remained stationary for 5 to 7 minutes before suddenly disappearing,On December 28, a red disc-shaped object was seen with a speed equal or greater than that of jet aircraft,The object left a vapor trail and was observed by two persons through binoculars.
sighted object: bright light and red disc-shaped object
witness description: two persons driving and other unspecified witnesses for the disc-shaped object
